query:
ALTER TABLE reports 
  DROP COLUMN IF EXISTS teamName,
  DROP COLUMN IF EXISTS floorManagerName,
  MODIFY COLUMN teamId int(11) NOT NULL,
  MODIFY COLUMN reportMonth int(11) NOT NULL;
